alert.note: Alert for Clay; Parke; Putnam (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 6:08PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN CLAY...CENTRAL OWEN...SOUTHEASTERN PARKE AND SOUTHWESTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES... At 604 PM EST, an area of heavy snow showers was located 8 miles north of Brazil, or 16 miles northeast of Terre Haute, moving southeast at 35 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers along with rapid reductions in visibility to as low as 1 mile. Roads may quickly become snow covered. Locations impacted include... Brazil, Spencer, Knightsville, Gosport, Harmony, Carbon, Center Point, Bowling Green, Lena, McCormicks Creek State Park, Freedom, Patricksburg, Bridgeton, Reelsville, Cagles Mill Lake, and Devore. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 24 and 38. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
